awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 13 nominations.

fullplot: The wife of a British Judge is caught in a self-destructive love affair with a Royal Air Force pilot.
plot: The wife of a British Judge is caught in a self-destructive love affair with a Royal Air Force pilot.
title: The Deep Blue Sea

tomatoes.consensus: Featuring an outstanding performance by Rachel Weisz, The Deep Blue Sea is a visually stunning, melancholy tale of subsumed passion.
